name: Unlock me (itch) (NiceXP)
description:
This is prototype Android game. No save mechanics

Swipe Control Type or mouse. 

Download on your PC

Maybe next year on google play. 

[Core]In the game, you have to hack devices (9 in total) in order to win over a girl (I couldn’t think of a better one). Also, you will have to fight viruses (there are 3 types) not only at the level but also in the menu

[GamePlay] The gameplay is like in a runner. Swipe left swipe right and don't get caught in an obstacle(Total 5 ways)

For the most part, this is the concept of the future game. If a significant number of people like it, then the game will soon appear on other sites with updated graphics, improved mechanics and, for smartphones.
